articles.title: Unpaid Labour on the Rise, Muslims Not Looking For Work: What the PLFS Data Reveals - The Wire
articles.description: On a positive note, the data shows that India's unemployment rate has reached a six-year low, standing at 3.2%. However, it's essential to examine the finer details to gain a more comprehensive understanding of the situation.
articles.content:
New Delhi: A significant number of individuals in India are engaging in self-employment or unpaid labour, shows the Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) data, for July 2022 to June 2023.
